short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Display the time in glorious HEXIDECIMAL colour in new tabs.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Converts the current time to a six digit hexidecimal colour. Original concept and code by J.E.Murphy (jemurphy.org) - Rewritten and turned into a Chrome extension by Jonic Linley (100yen.co.uk).
